title: Information Disclosure on lite.uber.com
vulnerability_information:
Hello, according to your [policy] (https://hackerone.com/uber?view_policy=true), you are looking for Local File Disclosure. And lite.uber.com also in scope for your program.

request:
```
GET https://lite.uber.com/auth/login HTTP/1.1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.11; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: ru-RU,ru;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3
Connection: keep-alive
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Length: 0
Host: lite.uber.com
```

activities.message:
Hi @dkusliy,

Thank you for your report and please continue to report further issues that you might find in the future.

We consider this issue a best practice. Stack traces that do not disclose sensitive information are not in scope for our program. I do not see a local file disclosure here.

Thanks
